import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; function Navbar() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); }; return (
MusicLearning
Accueil Cours À propos Contact
{user ? (
{user.name}, bienvenue sur MusicLearning
) : (
Connexion Inscription
)}
{/* Menu mobile */}
Accueil Cours À propos Contact
{user ? (
{user.name}, bienvenue sur MusicLearning
) : (
Connexion Inscription
)}
); } export default Navbar;
